channel.title: How do i add stuff to shops?
channel.description: I need to add a dungoneering cape to the skill cape shop. right now it is like nulled with a dung hood.. anyways how would i add the cape and not the hood? any help is appreciated.

item.title: How do i add stuff to shops?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

How are the other shops loaded? If the item is “nulled” (ie. when the item is in the inventory it shows up incorrectly), then you haven’t properly added the item client-side.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add stuff to shops?

item.title: How do i add stuff to shops?
item.dc:creator: @Master_CoderZ Master CoderZ
item.description:
@Master_CoderZ wrote:

If the Dung Cape is null then its not been added .
But u can add stuff in Server then open data then cfg u will find all the shops files there .

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add stuff to shops?

item.title: How do i add stuff to shops?
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

One of my code in Shops.java looks like this,

It’s just to add and delete codes and compile the server, if you want to add dungeoneering cape, then it’s just to add the code: 18508, or maybe dungeoneering cape (t): 18509
